content.detailedDescription: Three bright blasts of white light over the town of mt pleasant. about ten minutes later we heard helicopters. more than one at first. could here them for a few minutes before we decided to go outside. one flew over very low. we only saw the one, but we had definitely heard more than one. they were loud and low. seemed to look dark blue, long and big, and had search lights on. lights seemed to be too high for fireworks, although it is a possibility. don't know why helicopters would have showed up like that for one quick incident of fireworks.
content.summary: Three large flashes of light follwed by helicopters

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were vacationing in new hampshire and not familiar with the geography of the area.  we were walking on the golf course at the steele hills resort in late afternoon.  the golf course is at the rear of the resort and overlooks a wooded area sloping down a hill to a lake.  on the other side is another hill (mountain?) that is wooded.  i was taking photographs.  a fog began to roll in limiting visibility.  i could see only the outline of the landscape in front of me.  suddenly two large round light balls appeared and hovered over what seemed to me to be the body of water.  i was alarmed.  i began snapping still photographs and then realized i had video capability.  then i changed the setting to video.  the video clips are short; however they are video.  i had an eerie feeling and immediately told my husband that they were ���ufos.���  a man walked up to us and asked if i was videoing ���them.���  i told him i was.  we walked over to the lodge restaurant where we were seated for dinner.  we were seated in front of a large multi-story window that spanned the entire back of the restaurant and gave us an excellent view of the same scene we had been watching.  seated next to us were four ladies who commented that they had been watching the ���ufos.���  i then asked the manager if he had seen it before as they were still plainly visible in the same spot as before.  he said that he never had seen them.  i then took video clips of them.  when the video clips were downloaded to my computer i noted that they were shakey (i was shakey too!).  these were made through the window.  the others were made outside.  one video shows the two balls still hovering and pulsating vibrant colors.  another brief ball of light swiftly appears like a comet rushing directly to them and immediately disappears.  one of these video clips shows an outline of two faint balls directly behind the two bright ones.  the ufos then disappear.  the still photos i made of this event first show one snake-like white light.  the next ones shows two curved narrow white light rods.  i���m definitely no professional photographer and cannot say if the camera and/or me are responsible for the rod appearance and was so agitated i cannot really remember what they looked like.  i continued to have an erie feeling and did not want to be outside the condo.  this event has been on my mind since that evening.  i don���t have the technical expertise to analyze everything and determine if what i saw was ufo���s.  my gut feeling is that they were.
content.summary: Saw two bright round balls of light hovering over lake from the golf course and restaurant, steele hills resort, sanborton, nh.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to get in my car with my wife. i saw it to north of our apartment. it was clearly visible. i did not know my wife had the camera in the car so i did not get a picture of it the first time. but approxitmaly 1 hour later my wife went into a business and i stayed in the car when i seen it again but this time i had the camera i took 3 pics. the object was white/metallic and cigar shaped. i seen it aprox. 25 min. later when we went home, however i was not get that picture because it went behind a cloud and never came out the other side. i did get a picture of the cloud which was not that big. if it was a plane it would be visible after going through the cloud. another thing i noticed was it seem to be slower than an airplane. there was no sound any of the time i spotted it. as far as what i thought it was when i first saw it and each time i saw it was that it had no wings. it was like usaf drone. but as i seen it each time i got dumbfounded as to how low it seemed to be flying low. when i took the pictures when it was right over head. it seemed much closer live then it does on the on the photos. i tried to blow it up and it just makes it a little fuzzy, but you can tell it has no wings. when i saw it the first time it was going in one direction and the third time in the opposite direction like it was following a specific path. the first 2 pictures show the object going over top of us. the third picture is of the small cloud where it went behind and never reappears.
content.summary: I saw this object three times in two different locations.

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in my bed when i saw one red-orange light going more or less south to north, i dont gave it to much atencion becouse i thought that it was just a single little ballon (common in here). than the thing set on fire(still no surprise at all, these kind of ballon usualy burn it self on the air), but than i realize that the "ballon" was stopped whille burning.

i stayed staring the thing for a few moment and realize that it war burning in a vary uniquely way. it was laying sparks and some sort of molten metal, some spark looked to go up insted of fall, so its not paper that was burning, so it was not a ballon. 

i stoped to stare to the thing and started to look for my telescope, when i looked to the sky again its was not one single light, but three. i was shocked and terrified, my fir stupid action was get my cel fone and call my cousin, he answered the phone, i reported what i was seeing, he tried to look out the window, but he did not saw anything, which i already provided, as the ufo seemed to be in low altitude, and he lives quite far from my house. i tried to call my grandmother that was sleeping in the other room, but she said nothing, and i was afraid that he couldnt see the thing, (she doesnt see quite well), moreover i was terrified and was trying to talk in low voice and not make sudden movements to avoid attracting attention.

whille this, the ufo started to rotate, tham to move back to south, no noise, no nothing, but if anyone looked to the sky in that vary moment should perfectly see the thing. than it got out off my sight. i closed the window and stayed awake till the next morning.

i dont that have any substantial evidence of the event, becouse of it i try to dont speak about it with everyone. but my only intent is help in the study of the events. i want also to start to make researchs on my own, becouse i cant ignore these metter anymore.

i tried also to make contact with institutions of ufology of brasil, but it had no use.

is important to say that my neighborhood is quite active, and many other people recleme to had experiences of this kind.
content.summary: First was one light (i thought it was a ballon) than it burned out for 1 or 2 min, than when a looked again and it became a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: Ok so my friend and i were walking to taco bravo late at night to get some food and there was a strange blueish star that seemed a lil to bright so we kept watching it as we were walking..After about 5 mins of this thing being dead still it shoots outta the sky to a low altitude what appeared to be over stevens creek area..It was big in the sky and bright then started changing colors and flying up and down in mishappen circles rather quickly then it started flying off towards the south relatively slow compared to how fast it was moving first...People pulled over that seen it and we talked to some of them cause at first we were skeptical as to what we were seeing..Lotsa people saw this thing including the taco bravo workers..On our way back home we passed several younger spanish people running around with a video camera i guess trying to get footage of it but it had long since gone.We dont speak spanish so i have no way of knowing if they taped it before it dissapeared..But 1 thing is for sure it was something amazingly fast at first when it dropped outta the sky and there for sure had to be radar contact from san jose airport cause its right next to where we were at viewing this thing. i tried to record it with my cell camera but it looked so terrible through my cheap cell i just stopped cause it didnt show anything.But i have seen youtube footage from the same night and people are commenting about it on youtube but there has never been any mention in papers or anything an i was sure this would be...I see airtraffic all the time and nothing ever ever even resembled this things lighting flight pattern or speed..There's video out there i know it and several people saw this thing including san jose police..I seen 1 officer driving down saratoga slow down and observe it as it flew past but he didnt stop for whatever reason..
content.summary: Strange star drops outta sky stops then starts changing colors then travels south after crazy flight pattern

content.detailedDescription:
I cannot give a description like lights because there was a tarp over it and it was on a flatbed semi? i can say it was like a chevron or triangle and it was being hauled on a very long traier longer the most eighteen wheeler's? the tarp itself was covering the object which was tied down to the trailer with metal straps all around it? it did have a very distinct noise everytime the truck moved it kind of hummed? also i noticed that when it went by there was a very noticible electricle feeling? like static? 

this by the way was on a usaf sac base.
don't know if you will belive me or not but i have kept this to myself since 1986 and i am 44 now and thought someone should know about it? 
also i will be happy to answer any questions you may have in person only not over the land line please? i just don't anyone to think i am nus.

thanks
content.summary: Military

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i had taken our dog to a field, known as ritson fields, in the north end of oshawa for a walk. ritson fields is a non lit set of fields consisting of three soccer fields and a baseball diamond. there are also two parking lots. one near the south soccer field and one near the baseball diamond which is also closer to the two more northern soccer fields.

     as we were finishing our walk with the dog and returning to our vehicle to return home, we lived in the north end of oshawa at the time and have recently moved to courtice, both my wife and i saw an object flying at a very high rate of speed between an opening in two large trees on the north side of the parking lot. the really weird thing is that our dog even sat down and looked directly at the object as well. 

     what made us notice this was just the sheer speed and brightness of the object and at first we thought it was a fire work. the fact that we heard absolutely no sound led us to believe it was not a firework of any kind. also the trajectory of the object made it impossible to be a fire work. someone would have had to have been in the top of the tree to launch it in that direction and we were only approximately 50-70 feet from the trees. there was no one in the trees and again, we heard no sound. we looked at each other and then the dog and he was literally staring up where the object flew over.

     the strangest aspects of this sighting were the speed of the object, there was no real discernible color to it, it was just very bright, fast and multi-colored. another very strange aspect was the trajectory. i have no military or ballistics experience but the only thing i could equate it to is missile like. not the shape really, the shape was really just like a light with a tail trailing, but the action and trajectory. it was like it was hugging the earth and curving around with the shape of the earth. other than that i really don't know how to explain it? 

     i really can't say how high up it was, but it seemed to me that it would have had to have been within our atmosphere. as i stated earlier, we only saw this object for roughly 3 to 5 seconds and it was between an opening in between the two tallest trees on the north side of the parking lot. we lost site of it after it went behind the tree on the west side of the opening. as i stated earlier, it was headed in what seemed to be an almost due nw direction. it seemed to be traveling in a straight line at an incredible rate of speed. i could not even guess the speed but i have never seen anything travel this fast before.  

     i can tell you that after my wife and i saw this and looked at the dog, we looked again at each other and she first said to me "that was a ufo". to which i replied, "i know". funny thing is, if our dog could talk, i'm pretty sure he would have agreed with us. it was strange how he just sat down and looked up, just as we looked up.

     this is not the only time i believe i have seen a ufo or ufo's. i have had another experience driving home recently but i will complete another sighting report for that tonight.

     i know that some time has passed since the sighting has occurred, but my wife and i know what we saw and we know it was a real object. i had just never really known where to talk about it or think anyone would take us seriously. 

     i am a believer in ufo's and alien life. it, to me, is impossible for there not to be other life out in our universe or other universes. my wife was not quite the believer that i am, but she is now.

     thank-you for your time.
content.summary: Object flew over in nw direction

content.detailedDescription: Saw what looked like a satalite crossing the sky. no flashing lites. dimly lit. orange glow. going across the sky at speed a little faster than passenger jets. stright trojectory, then all of a sudden, the object stops and hovers. makes some irratic movements. i had a flashlight and shined it at the object and attempted to mimic the same movements as i saw doing. to my amazement, the object imediately turned off its lights. they actually dimmed as they went out. this was not a case of autokenesis, as i did look at it through a telescope and witnessed it moving in the scope. i remained dim for several minutes. then it slowly turned its lights on and after watching it for a few minutes and left in the same path it was taking.
content.summary: Sky clear. what i thought was a satalite stops and hovers 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription: While looking at clouds during an afternoon of storms i spotted a couple of silver balloon shaped objects flying through the breaks in the clouds. thinking they were balloons i watched moving about the speed of approximately 150-200 mph going to the northeast. to my amazement there started appearing several more. i hollered for my wife to bring the benoculars out which she did. she did and watched them with me. this continued for about 20 mins which there were multible silver round globes moving about the same speed in the same direction at the same height, approx. 5-6000 ft. they were flying above the heavy storm clouds and could be spotted between the breaks in the clouds. they were not balloons weather or any other type of balloons. i was puzzled about them and never discussed them with anyone other than my wife and never considered to be a ufo until i started thinking about them and started considering the possibility of them being a extraterrestial craft.
content.summary: Multible round silver balloon type globes flying through the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddy were chillin in his back yard smokin a blunt watchin the airplains land and take off from kingsly field (our local air base) when i noticed a slinder disc shaped object with red blinking lights just hovering in place about a mile from the base. i watched it for a moment thinking it was just a plain but it wasnt moving. it just lurked there for a bout thirty seconds after then it started to slowly move forward and then after a couple seconds it just took off with amazing speed out of sight. me and my buddy were in aww!! we bolth new what we just saw
content.summary: Disc shaped craft with red lights hovering close to our air base

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Some friends and i were camping in my parents back yard (the address in i gave above) when i was about 13 and at around 2 am in the morning we saw an egg shaped object in the sky.  we watched it for hours, it would make circles in the sky going in and out of clouds and then disappear for a few minutes.  then it would reappear in the same spot is disappeared from.  i am not sure why we didn't wake my parents up but none of us were scared of it.  the object almost seemed like it was watching us.  after a while it just disappeared and never reappeared.  we really didn't know what to think about it.  then i went to the library a few days later and started looking at books about ufo sightings and found a picture of an egg shaped ufo that looked a lot like the one we saw and i knew then what it was.
content.summary: Egg shaped object that circled in and out of clouds for hours

content.detailedDescription:
I apologize for not reporting this at the time. i have realized it was a mistake not to report it at the time, so i am reporting now.

i worked as a courier at night in gainesville, so i drove around all night. in the area of ne 15th st between ne 23rd. ave and ne 39th ave, heading north on 15th, near 31st ave: first i saw a meteorite falling toward the earth in the middle of the night. i asked around and i found no one but myself who saw it. i looked in the newspaper the next day and there was no report. it was big and white fiery looking like a shooting star but much closer like it would land in or near the golf course on 39th ave., east of 15th st. i assumed it was a meteorite. i thought it would make a hole when it hit the ground that people would notice.

some time later, approximately two or three months later,i saw another shooting star/meteorite in the same location at the same diagonal heading to the earth exactly the same. very strange.

a couple months later, maybe three or four months, in the middle of the summer in 2005, i saw it a third time just the same. it looked white like a meteorite. but i had an experience that i can only describe metaphorically as my brain shifted gears. then i saw it was a cigar shaped object. glowing green like neon, with 4 yellow circles in a row that looked like windows. speeding down towards the earth like it might land in the vicinity of the golf course. maybe it would land farther away, but if so only a couple of miles. 

i am 5'10" tall. holding my arm fully extended, sizing the object up between my thumb and forefinger, i would have my thumb and finger about 3" apart. i was driving in the middle of the night north on ne 15th st. all three times i saw it. exactly the same location within a couple of blocks. heading down at a diagonal from high in the sky towards the earth. i saw it come out from behind trees, then disappear behind trees again, as 15th st is lined with tall trees. gainesville regional airport is on ne39th ave about 1 mile east of 15thst. but the object looked like it would land west of the airport, or northwest. it could not have been an airplane, because the object was heading approx. north or nnw. whereas airplanes coming in for a landing head either east or west to land on the runway. also the airport is closed in the middle of the night, unless an arriving flight is very delayed.

i explain it to myself that the object was a craft, disguised as a shooting star. but since i saw it three times, on the third time, my brain was no longer tricked by the disguise, so i saw the true form and color. i did not hear any sounds any of the three times.

i wonder what aliens are doing in gainesville. it is a provincial town despite the presence of the university of florida. i wonder why aliens would come to such a boring place when they have the whole world to explore. maybe they want to be near cape canaveral. i was a little afraid i would get in trouble for perceiving the true form, that somehow they would know i could see them, but nothing happened. i am glad they are not interested in me. soon after the third sighting i quit the courier job so i stopped driving around at night. my quitting my courier job had nothing to do with the sightings.
content.summary: A cigar shaped glowing green with yellow circles like port holes moved diagonally down from the sky towards the earth.

content.detailedDescription: Walking on a moonlit trail at 7:30 p.M. my partner noticed a bright light in the sky. it was not moving quickly,with sound or blinking.  for me it was larger than a light on a plane and brighter with white centre and red edge. watching this light accelerate  and slow down holding a straight course slowly  across the sky. then i noticed a second object  farther south flying in a similar manner. after 40 seconds the first on became dimmer and disappeared the second did the same thing in a similar spot in the sky. no sooner had the second fizzed out a third one came out of the same area in the south sky and did a similar flight pattern again and disappeared as well after 30 seconds. i've seen comet's, meteor's, northern lights, sky lab, the iss and satellites never seen anything like this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 separate very bright soundless lights fly south to north fizzling out after a couple of minutes

content.detailedDescription:
My name is troy warner. i am a 40 year old army veteran. i need to tell someone about what i saw 19 years ago.

in 1990 i was a 21 year old member of the us army xviii airborne corps stationed at ft. bragg, nc. 

i had recently arrived in saudi arabia as part of "radio platoon" hhc 426, 35th brigade, xviii airborne corps as an rto.  we were temporarily living in a tent city camp adjusting to the heat before we moved out to the desert a week later.

we were up late playing spades when i went outside to use the latrine. it was about 1:00 am. the sky was clear and the stars were bright. i don't recall the location of the moon. i remember how vividly bright the stars were from horizon to horizon due to the lower level of light pollution than i was used to in the states. this is why i often looked at the saudi/iraqi night skies during my deployment. when i stepped out of my tent, i looked at the sky not only to admire the stars but also to survey the impressive array of military craft that could often be seen flying. what i saw was totally unexpected. 

i saw, traveling from north to south, a large black triangle silently and slowly moving across the sky. no lights, just black. i really could only see it because it obscured the starfield behind it. it took approximately three minutes to traverse the sky and move beyond sight. the night was cloudless with no wind.

i can describe its size this way....

hold your hands out in front of you with your arms straight. form a triangle with the tips of your thumbs touching and the tips of your pointer fingers touching. hold this finger triangle up over your head and view it against the sky. 

i must have been high because i could make out no detail on the craft.

it was not a b2 bomber. it was not a stealth fighter. i have not seen anything else like it. my father had been an aviation nut so i was fairly familiar with aircraft in general. 

the only thing it could potentially be, if it was a terrestrial craft, would be the supposed stealth blimp i've heard of recently. 

i, personally, believe it was way too large to be any blimp. it had an opposing feel/presence. it's flight path was perfectly straight without any of the drift or pitch/yaw you see when observing aircraft in flight.

unfortunately, i am the only witness that i am aware of.
content.summary: Large silent black triangle

content.detailedDescription: We had jsut come back from the movies, i went and saw paranormal activity with a few friends. i stopped and got some beer on the way home but the puppy was barking as soon as we got in so i took her out to go poty, i notcied the sky was clear and out of the corner of my eye i saw what looked like a string of lights. it was moving almost like a flock of geese would, going from west to east. it looked like a bunch of very distant stars almost all being blown around together. i dont think there is really anything to compare its motion to. i'd like to say a string being blown in the wind but it would have to be a very light string. i watched it for a minuet and yelled fo my fiance to come see but he did not come, so i went in to grab my digital camer which was sitting on the coffee table, i only took one picture and after seeing how dark the image was i gave up on the idea, it may have been because i didnt turn the flash off but by this time the objects were moving further away and i made one last attempt to call my faince out who did come when they were very distant. unfortunately he said he wasnt able to see the lights.Maybe i'm crazy but im very certain i saw this if you'd like i do have the picture without being edited what so ever and it is on a digital camera if that matters. i have the origional and i tried to make the image lighter...There were noclouds in the sky but it appears there are in the picture but im guessing that was only my breath. when i saw the objects they were in front of me, our puppy goes to the right in our flower bed to use the restroom, while watching her i noticed the objects and looked up. i would retype this but the website is deleating as i type so i dont want to retype this whole thing... i got the link to this website after looking up possible explainations for what i saw.
content.summary: Very distant string of lights moving almost like a string being blown in the wind across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was early in the morning about 4am.  my step-dad, step-brother, and i were all going dove hunting.  we were in the truck and had made it about 5 minutes away from the house and was just starting to go around a sharp curve.  there was also a car behind us that must have seen the same thing but i dunno.  i noticed a flash of light out of the corner of my eye and thought it was the light on the large microwave tower that was in center of town about 3 miles away but i realized it was too bright to be that light so i looked in the direction it was coming from and saw a huge sphere of light about maybe half a mile away and about maybe 30 or 40 feet off the ground.  the light was flashing slowly, maybe like off for a second then on for a second.  when the light was on the object stood still and it was very bright, but if i'm remembering correctly it wasn't really emitting light.  like it was very bright when u looked at it but the ground and sky in all directons was not lit up, only the object itself.  when the light was off the object moved closer, but u couldn't see anything at all.  so i'd say the light flashed off and on maybe about ten times or so over about 20 sec each time moving closer to our truck.  the last time the object came on it was right above our truck and then it was gone.  everyone in the car saw the same thing.  i was very scared for a few weeks as were my step-dad and step-brother.


a few weeks ago a friend of mine who did not know what i had saw told me that he also saw a large sphere light in the same field sometime in 2009.  the one he saw did not flash or move but stood still about 30 or 40 feet off the ground.  he was driving toward it and once he got close it dissapeared
content.summary: Sphere that flashed off and on about every second and moved closer when off

content.detailedDescription: While preparing dinner i looked out my back window noticing off in the distance what i thought was an airplane initially. however, i then noticed that the object stayed pretty stationary for a couple of minutes and flashed very very rapidly. it flashed multiple colors (red, blue, white, green & yellow) faster than a fast strobe light. i then called my wife over to see if it looked odd to her too and to see if she saw the same thing. she confirmed that she did see it and that it was a strange sight. my wife turned away for a second and i then noticed that a small red light appeared next to the larger flashing object. the red light flashed on for between half a second to one second and then it turned off. there was about a duration of 5 to 7 seconds before the red light would flash again. the red light seemed to hover beside the larger flashing object, almost as if it were a craft all its own. after about 2 and half to 3 minutes of being stationary both crafts or light objects began to move slowly toward the north east. the rapid flashing of the larger object remained the same as did the slow red flash with the pause. the objects started at about 45 degrees above the horizon line to the north of tempe, az before heading north east. i eventually lost the objects when a palm tree and obstructed my view and they eventually were so far off in the distance that they were hidden by mountain. this event lasted roughly 4 minutes. typically when i look out my back window i see planes heading south, west or east toward sky harbor airport. this is why i first thought this object was a plane. it's actions and rapid blinking pattern was unlike anything i'd ever seen. i also noticed that the air traffic seemed to be pretty clear during the even but soon after it headed toward the north east air traffic seemed to pick up and was quite heavy. my wife asked if i thought it may be a helicopter but as we both watched it we realized that it certainly was not a helicopter. the red flashing light that appeared next to the quick flashing object wasn't there when i first noticed it. so i'm not sure if it came from the larger object or if it were hovering there without illuminating.
content.summary: Looking out the house back window i saw a rapidly flashing light with a red light slowly flashing beside it off in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: My female companion and i were vacationing in paris and decided to go to the sacre coeur cathedral, which is up on a hill and provides a nice panoramic view of paris.  a few minutes before, i had commented that i had not seen any planes flying over paris while we were there.  when i took the shot, i saw nothing unusual in the camera and neither me nor my friend heard any noise.    she took a similar photo with a conventional slr film camera, but zoomed in more to downtown paris.  if you look in the foreground, no one is looking up, as they would have if a plane were flying so low and so nearby.  later, back at our hotel, we were looking through the shots we had taken that day and saw the object in the photo.
content.summary: Ufo over paris

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was leaving a home in palmetto bay looking east. near the fence he stopped and saw and object going north to south. it had no red or green lights on it.  his friend saw a red light on the object. it was long, thin, bright gold object which went by them n to s at approximately 1/4 mile a light the light dimmed.  the impression of the witness was that the light went off inside the object.  then there appeared a skeletal frame similar to fish bones.  something was running up the middle which was slightly brighter, like a fish without a head or tail.  then it went completely dark. the object did not look pleasant to the witness. afterward the witness felt uncomfortable.

the friend was in front of the house and saw a gold object similar to a bug horizontally with legs coming out of the top and bottom, but these could have been due to her poor eyesight.  it was headed southeast for about 1 minute with no sound. there were no red and green lights.  the object was shimmering. the light blinked off but she could still see the outline of the object for about 1/4 of a minute.When it was not lit she saw one tiny red light on the front of the object.  the whole sighting lasted about 60 seconds. her personal reaction was not to pay attention to the matter. the sighting made her feel "creepy". 

mary margaret zimmer, fl. asd, fi

[note to dispatcher: no ground traces or paranormal phenomena at the time of the sighting. cat-1]
content.summary: Gold cigar-shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Our  family had at least five contacts over a four year period.
first my daughter martha described her experience.  then connie told me what happened to her.  john described an "owl"  who came in the window
"but he didn't get me, i hid between th edge of the mattress and the wall"
then the most detailed information came from a child who,at that time was a little less than four.  finally, exactly a year later they came for me.
three aliens named xeno, nem and omah took me away and removed ovum
all of these contacts happened at night probibly after one am in our bedrooms.  i have kept this to myself for years and told the children not to discuss anything about their experiences because i didn't want to get the reputation of being mentally ill and i wanted to avoid our being the "crazy mccann family" at that time no one believed in aliens or flying saucers and if i had spoken of it i would have had personal difficulties with neighbors and others.Times have changed and if anything i can say could be helpful i will cooperate fully.
content.summary: Abduction  examination  medical

content.detailedDescription:
I am relating what my wife and her friend saw tonight while walking.  the object was high in the sky, well above a couple of airline airplanes they saw below the object. i asked how long it was, and they claimed that it was the length of a forefinger held at arms length. the large planes below it were about one half a finger length by comparison.  the object they claimed had a strange golden glow all the way around it like a narrow oval.  they wondered at the time why and how it could glow like it was.  kelly commented that they could not see any flashing lights which they thought was strange as well as the lack of wings. at the time they had two airplanes in sight at the same time.

at first they thought it must be a star but the shape was wrong and it was traveling slowly north.  while they were still watching it, it suddenly was gone.  had it been something in orbit of that size, they felt it would have faded to the north, but again they said it was way too big and elongated.

both girls came into the house a few minutes ago, really confused but excited at actually seeing something strange.
content.summary: Large, cigar shape, golden glow, north bound, slowly, disapearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the 210 fwy east bound and i looked towards jpl and right behind the mountain range where 2 peaks were there was a ufo the size of a football field. i could see it as clear as a bird. it was silver(daul) shaped like a football but larger. it hovered between two mountain peaks before taking off. was not a blimp. it moved to fast for that. in back of the mountain range where jpl is  there is something going on over there.
content.summary: Looking towards jpl this ufo behind mountain range

content.detailedDescription: Myself,my brother and my cousin went for a walk about 10:30 pm on approx june 10th 1973, after a short walk we noticed a disc hoovering approx. 200 feet above us and about 100 feet in diameter emitting blue, yellow and pink lights from the center of the disc, with an approx diameter of the lights being 20 feet. all three of us starred for several seconds when suddenly the disc shot stright up disapearing in the sky. the disc was silent with no wind or sound coming from it. we believe this ufo traveled faster than the speed of light.
content.summary: Saw disc hoovering in sky emitting lights from the center of disc approx. 200 feet in air

content.detailedDescription:
Alien "animal mutilation" witnessed by my golfing buddy in 1964 at mc clellan air base in sacramento. my friend has agreed to talk to you upon my request. he is paul of the well a known famly. his brother is a majority owner of an nba basketball franchise.
he is 78 years old and lives here in sacramento california. he is the only person i have ever heard that has witnessed animal mutilations by alien beings not the military!
he saw 6 small midget like beings dressed in what he describes as uniforms? while he was waiting for his father from work at the base. he witnessed the disklike craft (18ft diam, 8 ft high)land at the north end of the base and settle down without landing pods or gear. it illumnated the area bright as day after landing. shortly thereafter he witnessed a half dozen of these beings depart the craft for the better part of a half hr at a distance of approximately 50 yards. the midgets appeared to be working around the animals(cows)on the ground.
he didnt know what to think about the incident until he read an article in the newspaper the next day regarding animal mutilations.
call me for his phone number..Better hurry as his health is failing. he is lucid and he remembers the incident as if it happened yesterday. he is credible and is the most honest truthful human i know.
i think this is an important sighting as it debunks the theory about the military being responsible....
i too have witnessed a ufo while a teenager in texas in 1964. it was much different than paul's sighting. my sighting was similar to jimmy carter's sighting. i and 2 of my high shool chums saw a gigantic luminous "sphere" (like the moon without craters)at nite on a lonely texas road. this was not a machine or disk that engaged my car several times. there was no contact(did not check the time?) just appeared to be observing us. then after several departures and returns over my car it dashed out of sight. it seemed like just a few minutes but who knows how much time passed as we did not check the time of the sighting too excited back then as teenagers!
content.summary: Historical - close encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the hollywood sign and the griffith observatory. i had just parked my vehicle and was walking towards the observatory and decided to snap a few shots of the building. i didn't notice the object until i uploaded the pictures on my computer. that's when i noticed this odd shape in the sky in one of my pictures.I've posted two pictures. the first one is where the object is to the right of the screen. the second was taken about a min after from a different angle.
content.summary: Taking pictures at the griffith observatory. i uploaded the pictures and found this strang image on the right of the picture. not sure what is. it sure doesn't look like a bird or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
I was helping a friend and her mother carry some things out to their car at a friends house in bayview (near taylor and russell streets) when i looked up in the sky and saw some lights.  initially i thought it was just lights, maybe late fireworks.. but as i watched them they seemed to have a shape, or lack of shape.  it sort of looked like an airplane but there was no fuselage or tail.  as it passed my line of view, about what seemed like 30-50 feet above the school (two or three stories) across the street from where i was standing, i could see the stars disappear as they were blocked by the border of the craft.  it was triangular in shape.  the craft had no color, it was like the absence of light.  there were about 6-7 lights all around it one at each corner and maybe one midway along the three lines that make up the triangle; the brightest of which was in the front -(they were all white except the blinking red one on the bottom - which made me think it was a plane) - looking like a car headlight only way brighter.  i could see a cone of light reflected off the moisture in the air as it passed.  i remember thinking i've never seen a light that bright on any aircraft.  it was probably going about 10-15mph, not very fast, very low.
the friend i was with and her mother both saw it too, and said "what is that?!?", i tried to calm them down by saying it was a plane but i knew it wasn't..  it had a quiet quiet low hum or whirr sound that it seemed to be making.  i remember thinking if i was inside i never would have seen it, or heard it.  as it passed us and went behind the trees (it was flying at about the tree line) i thought about chasing it but i had no idea how.  i kept thinking there is no way that really just happened. 

the guy (controller) at the airport (mitchell int'l) said it was most likely a f-117a nighthawk (commonly referred to as the "stealth bomber") but! he could not confirm as the us military is not required to log their arrivals and departures from civilian airports.  i know what a stealth bomber looks like and this was not that.

i also called and totally weird-ed out the radio station (fm102.1) and probably half of milwaukee (actually probably more like like half of se wisconsin) the next morning when i called to report what we saw, though.  of course, they just laughed at me.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo moving low and slowly 6-7 lights mostly white one blinking red in the middle on the bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
Going home from work at 3:30am and seen a low flying light north of me. it was the forth time i seen the object in a week. this time it was closer to me then the other times. so i pulled off the road and got out of my car. i started watching the object. then the power lines next me started to make a very loud noise. i got scare the hair on my body was standing on end. got back in my car and drove off.

1. ghent mn going home from work
2. could not miss it.
3. big plane.
4. bright light moving fast.
5. scared lots of energy in the air.
6. i did want to stay there any longer and drove off.
content.summary: Low flying object heading west. it was very bright with no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
Was watching orbs of red and white light fly behind tree and hover and blink, suddenly 2 of the white orbs began moving slowly they went down and up so fast it startled me..I folled them with the camera.. they zoomed up in the sky in no time and formed 2 large craft. all caught on video. i have posted the video on youtube and it can be found here http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=oafkq4ff6ak .

there were 2 additional craft they joined up with hovered for a bit and flew east over brush mountain. i have been taping unusual craft doing bizarre things above brush mountain and in the cathedral/downtown area of altoona since november. several people over altoona are witnessing these events as well.
content.summary: Red and white lights in tree hovering they move then lightening fast shoot up in sky to form 2 large craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out of the pie in the sky pizza restaurant with my to-go order. i am walking down the stairs toward the car (rear of pizza place is a parking lot for apartments). i noticed 2 extremely orangish/white objects next to each other in the sky approx. 2 miles to the east. the apartments sit on a hilltop, and you can see very far to the east. the lights were slightly pulsating and brighter than any aircraft or other object i've ever seen in the night sky. i actually saw an aircraft north of the objects and they looked nothing like it. i was looking around the parking lot to grab the attention of others, but there was no one around that would have been able to see them from my vantage point. the buildings would have blocked their view and i wasn't going to yell at the only person i saw all the way across the parking lot.

at first, the 2 objects were next to each other. then they moved away from each other and moved back together. next, they started making circle maneuvers in the sky as if one was chasing the other. next, one moved above the other one and then it ascended diagonally away from the other one. then, they both stopped maneuvering and hovered in place. 

i ran to my truck and drove up to the top of the parking lot to see if i could catch a peek of them again. by the time i got to the top of the lot, they were moving at a very high rate of speed to the southeast. i then lost track of them because of trees and other buildings.

these were definately in no way shape or form an aircraft or flares. there is nothing that i know of that can make perfect circles in the sky like they did. also, the lights slightly pulsated and were about 15 times brighter that any flare i've ever seen. we all know that aircraft landing lights can look bright, but these orangish/white lights were again about 10-15 times brighter than anything that is man made in the sky. they both were about 1/2 the size of a full moon in the sky.

unfortunately, i did not have a camera with me as it was still in my bag at home as i had just returned from visiting family for the holidays. i do not use drugs and i rarely drink alcohol. i was not under the influence of any intoxicants when i saw what i saw. 

both of my brothers described a similar event to myself and my parents a few years ago. they saw the same spherical objects (they saw 4) in a very remote area of maine calleds machias bay (near cutler, maine). i wasn't sure what to think, but i am now a believer as what i saw could not be anything that is man made.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 2 extremely bright  orangish/white (slightly pulsating lights) spherical objects interacting w/ each other. moved in ways in the sky like nothing i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
Report taken by dispatch while witness was explaining event. steve cox, mufon dispatch

about 10-10:30 am a fellow mechanic asked john for a ride to his house to get a tool that he didnt have, john siad yes, get in my truck



while driving up an alley that had the monument in full view, he saw a silver ball3 to 4 foot in diam hovering over the monument (41������50������8������n 103������42������3������w). he turned to his friend and said do you see this, and when he turned to look it was gone, just vanished.

mike collects indian fossels and one day while in the bad lands (owned by the government) he noticed a round impression in the ground. the gound was very rocky and hard, dried up, what ever left the impression must have been very heavy....

when he saw the silver ball over the monument he knew what left the impressions.
content.summary: Silver ball over scotts bluff monument
